Name: Wildfox Surfing Paradise
About the game: Wildfox Surfing Paradise is a short, physics-based surfing adventure where you explore a tropical island. Show off your best stunts at the beach and earn money from photoshoots Surf down massive waterfalls Buy new surfboards, like a rocket-powered one, to do even wilder stunts. The sophisticated fluid simulation makes for a unique gaming experience. While the different stunts are easy to learn you will need some time to get a feeling for your board to master the waves. The upbeat soundtrack, composed by Elliot Stone, will keep your energy levels high. Every region has its own unique music tracks. Warning: The Early Access version only includes a tutorial and a single region. Most players will be able to finish all of the current content in 15 to 30 minutes.
